# Draft:Dr. Donald E. Battle - Theologian

----
Dr. Donald E. Battle, D.D. â€“ One of America's top Christian Theologians of the twenty-first century, with over 32 years of ministry experience as a Christology Scholar, Theologian, Minister, Bible Scholar, and Apologist. The expert on the Divinity of Jesus Christ: The Theology of the twelve reasons why Jesus is God. He graduated from the International Seminary with academic honors in the year 1983. His thesis was entitled, The Divinity of Jesus Christ. He has devoted over twenty years of biblical research related to the Lord Jesus Christ.
